Comment.Language: A prayer for the Metropolitan: After reading to him the litanies for the bishop; this prayer shall be added:
صلاة لأجل المطران: من بعد أن تُقرأ عليه طلبات الأسقف، يُضاف إليها هذه الصلاة:

O BEING, Master, Lord, God the Pantocrator, Father of compassions and God of all comfort, the Father of our Lord, God and Savior Jesus Christ,

Who has caused His churches to be illumined by the unutterable light of His only-begotten Son.

Who chose Abraham His beloved unto an inheritance of faith, and Enoch, His Saint, He translated in the chariots of light, because he pleased Him.

Pour out upon him from the governing spirit of Your own knowledge which he has received in Your holy Church, that he may be renewed in what pleases You in (his) generation; the Holy Spirit, the Spirit of truth, the Spirit of Perfection; the Paraclete; Which You have given to Your holy Apostles and the Prophets.
